adrFormatAddress: 517 E 71st St, New York, NY 10021-4871, USA

originalText.text: If there was a  MINUS 5 score I would give it ! Having surgery at HSS, the garage for the guest accommodations is right next to MPG garage. We drove in thinking it was for the Belaire. When I asked the attendant, if this garage was the proper garage for guests at the Belaire, he refused to answer.  He was abrupt,condescending, angry and rude. If it wasn’t for a kind customer that knows the area, we would have parked there at a very expensive rate for two nights. This guy was awful. He knew we were going to HSS AND THE BELAIRE  and he refused to be of any help and he was very mean. When we realized it and started putting our bags back in the car he got enraged. Didn’t have a name tag but it was at 3:44pm on Tuesday. He should be fired.

originalText.text: The guy working tonight wouldn't take my car. I've parked there many times as i work at the hospital across the street. There is no way of reaching the company to put a complaint in. Stay away.

text.text: The guy working tonight wouldn't take my car. I've parked there many times as i work at the hospital across the street. There is no way of reaching the company to put a complaint in. Stay away.

originalText.text: I wish i looked at the reviews before i parked here and spent $53. The worker that i dealt with was extremely rude and told me that i couldn’t put my belongings in my car while i was waiting for him to assist other people because i don’t work there. My car was also the only car with the window down. When i went to go look at the parking tickets the attendant rushed over to me and said i could t touch or move them because i don’t work there (i didn’t do either) then he also told me that i couldn’t insert my own credit card and that he had to do it because i don’t work there. The whole time his voice was raised. I wouldn’t suggest parking here ever I’m not sure why they’re even still open with the amount of bad reviews this facility has. It’s also really hard to escalate any issues you have with this facility because the manager as well as the one worker speaks very little English and aren’t helpful at all. Wouldnt recommend

originalText.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. We lost our parking ticket and even though we prepaid for the spot, could scan our ticket, and prove we owned the car, the parking attendant held us captive with the gate closed for over half an hour and continued to demand additional forms of identification and wanted another credit card. The parking attendant continually yelled he could not release the car without the paper parking ticket. Please do not park here for you own safety.

originalText.text: Be very careful using your credit card at this facility. My card number was stolen this week from this place and several fraudulent charges showed up after using my credit card here. I have reported the charges to my Bank and filed a police report.
